layout.title: The section layout
layout.description: Section layout name/code in pagebuilder. Parsed but not used in mobile.

name.title: section layout name/code in pagebuilder.
name.description: Section laout name/code in pagebuilder. used for tracking and analytics.

outputType.title: The output type
outputType.description: The output type used in pagebuilder. outputType=xxx. It is not used in mobile, but good to dispaly in feed.

regions.title: The region (or the region list) in the layout.
regions.description: The top level region container for page content. Not sure mobile can take multiple regions for section front or not. need verify from mobile team. If mobile only can take one region, then the region will be 'main-content'

main-content.title: The main-content region
main-content.description: For now it has hard coded region name (assume we only have one region). we need apply all page layout regions into this region bucket.

items.title: The items Array
items.description: An array of chains(list of blocks with 'chain' wrapper) and ads.

tracking.title: The tracking parameter list
tracking.description: This tracking list parameters are for tracking and content refresh indication.

author.title: The section author
author.description: The section is placeholder, there is not author can be identifed, so keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile.

blogname.title: The blog name
blogname.description: This is not applicable for section. so keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile

channel.title: The section channel name.
channel.description: Could not find mapping for this directly, so please use 'tronc'-<last section path>, last section path for homesection is 'homepage'. Pared but not used in mobile.

columnname.title: The colum nname
columnname.description: This is not applicable for section, keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile

commercial_node.title: The commercial node
commercial_node.description: No directly mapping can be found. Use current site main domain (no wwww). Used as tracking in mobile.

content_category.title: The content category
content_category.description: Ths is not applicable for section. keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile.

content_id.title: The content id
content_id.description: Ths is not applicable for section. keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile.

content_type.title: The content type
content_type.description: No directly mapping can be found. user the last section path in url. homesection apply 'homepage'. Parsed but not used in mobile.

headline.title: The section headline
headline.description: This is not applicable for section. keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile.

hierarchy.title: The URL hierarchy
hierarchy.description: The full section path for current secitonm not backslash at end. Homesection is '/homepage'.

news_or_commercial.title: The section purpose
news_or_commercial.description: I assume it is used to id current section is for brand content or not, Currently not mapping defined. always keep as 'News' for now. Not used in mobile.

op_ranking.title: The op ranking
op_ranking.description: No match mapping. always keep as 'no sentiment - no ideology', Parsed but not used in mobile.

page_name.title: The page name
page_name.description: Could not find mapping for this directly, so please use 'tronc'-<last section path>, last section path for homesection is 'homepage'. Pared but not used in mobile.

page_num.title: The page number
page_num.description: No match mapping. Always keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile.

page_type.title: The page type
page_type.description: No match mapping. Always keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile.

platform.title: The source of platform
platform.description: No match mapping. Always keep as 'pagebuilder'. Used in Mobile.

published.title: The published date?
published.description: I think it is not applicable for section. Alway keep as empty string. Used in Mobile.

section.title: The section schema
section.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

sectionfront.title: The sectionfront?
sectionfront.description: Could not find match. Empty in exist feeds. so we always keep as empty string. Used in Mobile

source.title: The source
source.description: This is not applicable for section. keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile.

story_type.title: The story type
story_type.description: This is not applicable for section. keep as empty string. Parsed but not used in mobile.

subsection.title: The subsection path
subsection.description: The last section path in url.

track_scrolling.title: The track_scrolling enable
track_scrolling.description: No match mapping. always return 'false' string. Not used in mobile.

last_modified.title: The last_modified date
last_modified.description: The last_modified date for current section. Used in Mobile.

lmt.title: The lmt
lmt.description: The last modifed date in week day format based on utc timezone. Used in Mobile.

checksum.title: The checksum code
checksum.description: based on mobile the latest comment, this is not required. set default to empty string.

label.title: The label element
label.description: A label element can be used in chain and homepage-story items. Chain label: This is not part of fusion yet. furture ticket should add label for chain. this is not required element in chain element.

text.title: The label text
text.description: Inside Chain: The chain label text is block header if it exists .

label_alignment.title: The label_alignment
label_alignment.description: Inside Chain: The label_alignment should be part of chain configuration. default to 'left'

label_style.title: The label_style
label_style.description: Inside Chain: label style should be part of block configuration. if not configured, default to 'label label-kicker'

label_color.title: The label_color
label_color.description: Inside Chain: this is not required for chain. this element should not display.

homepage-story.title: homepage story
homepage-story.description: Main content element in pagebuilder block (feature)

item_type.title: The item_type
item_type.description: The item type of homepage-story element always as 'homepage/story'.

feature_name.title: The feature_name
feature_name.description: This is lowercase content item title with '-' replace space.

text_alignment.title: The text_alignment
text_alignment.description: it should be allow left and center based on mobile team, however, currently there is no match in pagebuilder for this. by default we show 'left'.

items.title: The current item detail array
items.description: Based on current feed structure, there only one item for each array.

commercial_node.title: The commercial_node
commercial_node.description: it should be pagebuilder_path_for_native_apps for current article section path. if content's CURRENT section does not contain or current content does not constructed by api, return as empty string. for sub_item_type as secondary items, this element should not displayed.

headline.title: The headline
headline.description: The current article's mobile headline rendering details

alignment.title: The Headline alignment
alignment.description: based on block configuration, if no configuration, default to left.

font_style.title: The headline font_style
font_style.description: Explain seprately in different doc. possible values: normal-style, thin-style and hightlight-style

size.title: The headline size
size.description: Explain seprately in different doc. possibel values: small, normal, x-small and xx-small

text.title: The headline text
text.description: Current article headline text. Follow block(feature) logic to display mobile version of headline or not.

last_modified.title: The article last_modified date
last_modified.description: The artilce last modified date (content.last_updated_date). If item is configurated directly on block, then use block create date. Date format can based on the example.

type.title: The article type
type.description: The article type (content.type). if item is directly configured in block, default to 'web'.

access_level.title: The access_level
access_level.description: current article access level. possible value: meteredThenPaid, freeForAll, meteredThenFree, paidOnly. In our mapping, meteredThenPaid is metered, else render as empty string. metered logic can be find in jsonld isAccessibleForFree )

sub_item_type.title: The article display level
sub_item_type.description: The article display level. possible value: primary, secondary. Set this to secondary if current item created by related links in block, else set as primary.

media.title: The article media
media.description: There could be video and photo as media, currently there is no example for video rendering, so we only map article photo, this is based on current article content.promo_items.basic

art_position.title: The art_position
art_position.description: Media position is based on current block(feature) configuration. all possible value: high, low, left, right, left-of-blurb, left-of-headline, right-of-headline, right-of-blurb, below-headline. current mapping: Above text(high), Blow text(low), Right of text(right-of-headline), Left of text(left-of-headline).

art_width.title: The art_width
art_width.description: Based on current feed, possibe logic is: meida above or below text, set to 12. single item block default to 4, list item block default to 3

aspect_ratio.title: The aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: This come from block configuration on media ratio if any, else default to 1. possible value: 1 (1x1), 1.3(4x3), 1.7(16x9), 3 (?)

caption_content.title: The caption_content
caption_content.description: Media caption (content.promo_items.basic.caption). null if media is not from content API
examples: The 10U Vikings team dominated the Miami Gardens Ravens 25-0 to take the FYFL Super Bowl title.User Upload Caption: *

caption_size.title: The caption_size
caption_size.description: Current feed only render caption_size as 'small'.

height.title: The media height
height.description: Media height (content.promo_items.basic.height). null if media is not from content API

media_type.title: The media_type
media_type.description: media type can be posttv, youtube or featured, currently we only map photo which rendered as 'featured'

width.title: The media width
width.description: Media wdith (content.promo_items.basic.width). null if media is not from content API

column.title: column element
column.description: Column element is subcomponment of Chain, each Chain hold one or more columns

item_type.title: The item_type
item_type.description: column item type is always be 'column'.

items.title: Blocks (features)
items.description: An array of content elements in current block(feature).

chain.title: Chain item
chain.description: An item contain pagebuilder feature(block). This is not chain in pagebuilder.

item_type.title: The item_type
item_type.description: The item type for chain item always rendered as 'chain'.

chain_name.title: The chain_name
chain_name.description: The name(label) of current block or feature.

items.description: Each Chain contains one or more column elements.

ad.title: Ad item
ad.description: A item contain an Ad. This item will be rendered if an ad block appeared in rendering sequence on current section.

feature_name.title: The ad feature_name name
feature_name.description: The name always under format 'ad-<n>-do-not-move' <n> is an incremental number base on mobile ad appearance on the current section. If there already has n ad items rendred on current section, this <n> should be n-1. The <n> for the 1st ad item, should be 0.

item_type.title: The item_type
item_type.description: The item type for ad item always rendered as 'ad/flex-app'.

items.title: The Ad item definition array.
items.description: The orginal design may have more than more Ad definitions for Ad item. However, in current case, we only have one item in this Ad definition array.

ad_delivery.title: The ad_delivery
ad_delivery.description: The ad delivery always rendered as string 'vi'.

ad.title: The ad rendering destination.
ad.description: The ad rendering destination always rendered as string 'flex-app'.

commercial_path.title: The commercial_path
commercial_path.description: The commerical path is current section path.Home section is '/hp'

csnd.title: The csnd value
csnd.description: This value always rendered as 'ptsf_dapparc_p<n>_uaa'. <n> is an incremental number base on mobile ad appearance on the current section. This <n> is defined differently than ad feature name. If there already has n ad items rendred on current section, this <n> should be n. The <n> for the 1st ad item, should be 1.

design.title: The design value
design.description: The design value always rendered as 'apparc' for section front.

pos.title: The pos value
pos.description: The pos value always rendered as integer string, same logic for <n> defined in csnd value.

ptype.title: The ptype value
ptype.description: This is based on section meta value ptype, default is 'sf' for section.
